title: API Create/Edit Documents Office for WinRT
body:
Developers need create/edit document from Windows Store Apps.
Thereby, integrate WinRT apps with Office.

comments.body: Developers need WinRT APIs to preview the office documents in Windows Store app.

Microsoft Open Technologies Inc., announced the release of an Open XML SDK as an open source Project!!!
http://blogs.technet.com/b/openness/archive/2014/06/25/open-xml-sdk-released-open-source-project.aspx#.U62Hg3lgmUk

Hopefully with the upcoming arrival of Office for WinRT, involving an API to generate Office documents (Word, Excel ...) compatible with desktop versions.
Otherwise, it would be a disappointment!
The Windows Store Apps need a push towards business. We need a way to generate reports, invoices ... to send via email, store / edit... And create truly useful windows runtime apps!
